code: import React from"react";import"./endgame.styles.scss";import{selectScore}from"../../redux/birds/birds.selector";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{reestGame,fetchImageStart}from"../../redux/birds/birds.action";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var EndGame=function EndGame(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleEndGame=function handleEndGame(){dispatch(reestGame());dispatch(fetchImageStart());};var score=useSelector(selectScore);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"endgame-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"endgame-title",children:"\u041F\u043E\u0437\u0434\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043B\u044F\u0435\u043C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"endgame-subtitle",children:["\u0418\u0433\u0440\u0430 \u043E\u043A\u043E\u043D\u0447\u0435\u043D\u0430. \u041E\u0431\u0449\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0437\u0443\u043B\u044C\u0442\u0430\u0442 ",score," \u0438\u0437 30 \u0432\u043E\u0437\u043C\u043E\u0436\u043D\u044B\u0445 \u0431\u0430\u043B\u043B\u043E\u0432."]}),score==30?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"endgame-subtitle",children:"\u041F\u043E\u0437\u0434\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043B\u044F\u0435\u043C, \u0412\u044B \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0448\u043B\u0438 \u0438\u0433\u0440\u0443."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"endgame-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleEndGame();},children:"\u041F\u043E\u043F\u0440\u043E\u0431\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044C \u0435\u0449\u0435 \u0440\u0430\u0437!"})]});};export default EndGame;
